query:
SELECT
                st.trip_id,
                st.stop_id,
                st.arrival,
                st.departure
            FROM
                stop_time st
            WHERE
                st.trip_id IN (
                    SELECT
                        t.id
                    FROM
                        trip t
                    WHERE
                        t.updated_at >= (($1)::timestamp with time zone - INTERVAL '5 minutes')
                        AND (
                            ($3 = TRUE AND t.route_id = ANY($2))
                            OR
                            ($3 = FALSE AND (t.assigned IS NOT NULL OR t.route_id = ANY($2)))
                        )
                )
                AND (
                    $4 = FALSE OR
                    (st.arrival BETWEEN $1 AND $1 + INTERVAL '4 hours')
                )
            ORDER BY
                st.arrival;
